name: Leontine Boxem
what_you_do: Leontine Boxem is a life coach, breakthrough mentor, and motivational speaker who runs The Freedom Code™ and LoveCode programs to help clients achieve transformation in life, love, and leadership.
who_you_serve: Changemakers, leaders, entrepreneurs, and visionaries seeking freedom in life, love, and leadership; also those thriving after cancer.
social_proof: Award-winning author and speaker; claims to have helped transform 4,600 lives/businesses; hosts The Freedom Code Podcast.
signature_programs: The Freedom Code™, LoveCode, Dreamporting Academy, New Life Post-Cancer Breakthrough Call
business_focus: Transformational life and business coaching for changemakers and entrepreneurs seeking freedom in life, love, and leadership.
service_provided: Life coaching, breakthrough mentoring, motivational speaking, podcast hosting, online programs, post-cancer coaching
